metadata.title: CVE-2020-6575 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Race in Mojo in Google Chrome prior to 85.0.4183.102 allowed a remoteattacker who had compromised the renderer process to potentially perform asandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
